artefact: Take an official practice motorcycle theory test

artefact.overview: Take the official practice motorcycle theory online tests - the tests are free and look similar to the actual theory test
artefact.body:
You can take the official practice motorcycle theory tests online for free. You can’t practise the hazard perception part with these tests.

The practice test screens look similar to the theory test you’ll take at the test centre.

Motorcycle riding theory test: example 1.

Motorcycle riding theory test: example 2.

artefact.title: Driving tests and learning to drive

details.description: Includes booking a test, changing and cancelling tests, rules and fees

Book your driving test or get a tax disc online, find out the legal requirements for buying, owning, importing or scrapping a car or motorcycle, and read about your rights and responsibilities as a driver.
